name: INDefaultCardTemplate
desc: A card template for customizing the Siri watch face for a shortcut.

items.name: init(title: String)
items.desc: Creates a default card template with the specified title.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title displayed in the Siri watch face card.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: The subtitle displayed in the Siri watch face card.

items.name: var image: INImage?
items.desc: The image displayed in the Siri watch face card.
